messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2837
messages.msgSnippet: A lot of good ideas about Beauty.  I also thought of a scavenger hunt, either indoors or out (weather?).  Maybe give each group/team/ or just everyone together
messages.messageBody:
A lot of good ideas about Beauty. I also thought of a scavenger hunt,
either indoors or out (weather?). Maybe give each group/team/ or just
everyone together a list of things to look for - not necessarily specifics,
but rather "find something that makes you smile/happy/feel good/etc.",
"something that might be beautiful to you/ your mom/boys/grandparents/people
from other cultures/etc." Just let your imagination go! Bonus: No cost
(maybe paper)!

Brenda R.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2837
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I did find a few anti-HSLDA articles last year.  I could usually understand the point of view being expressed, and generally agreed with some of the
messages.messageBody:
Sandra,

I did find a few anti-HSLDA articles last year. I could usually understand
the point of view being expressed, and generally agreed with some of the
criticism, tho not all. I have heard of Cafi Cohen, maybe read a website
she has?, but have not heard of Karl Bunday. I'll look him up. Thanks.

Brenda R.

PS - I enjoy your posts!
